C

close() - Method in class com.martinkl.warc.WARCFileReader
Closes the file.
close() - Method in class com.martinkl.warc.WARCFileWriter
Flushes any buffered data and closes the file.
com.martinkl.warc - package com.martinkl.warc
Common implementation of reading and writing files in WARC format.
com.martinkl.warc.mapred - package com.martinkl.warc.mapred
Input and output formats using Hadoop’s ‘old’ (mapred) API.
com.martinkl.warc.mapreduce - package com.martinkl.warc.mapreduce
Input and output formats using Hadoop’s ‘new’ (mapreduce) API.
createRecordReader(InputSplit, TaskAttemptContext) - Method in class com.martinkl.warc.mapreduce.WARCInputFormat
Opens a WARC file (possibly compressed) for reading, and returns a RecordReader for accessing it.

DEFAULT_MAX_SEGMENT_SIZE - Static variable in class com.martinkl.warc.WARCFileWriter
 

G

getBytesRead() - Method in class com.martinkl.warc.WARCFileReader
Returns the number of bytes that have been read from file since it was opened.
getContent() - Method in class com.martinkl.warc.WARCRecord
Returns the body of the record, as an unparsed raw array of bytes.
getContentLength() - Method in class com.martinkl.warc.WARCRecord.Header
The number of bytes in the body of the record, similar to RFC2616.
getContentType() - Method in class com.martinkl.warc.WARCRecord.Header
The MIME type (RFC2045) of the information contained in the record’s block.
getDateString() - Method in class com.martinkl.warc.WARCRecord.Header
A 14-digit UTC timestamp formatted according to YYYY-MM-DDThh:mm:ssZ, described in the W3C profile of ISO8601.
getField(String) - Method in class com.martinkl.warc.WARCRecord.Header
Returns the value of a selected header field, or null if there is no header with that field name.
getGzipCodec(Configuration) - Static method in class com.martinkl.warc.WARCFileWriter
Instantiates a Hadoop codec for compressing and decompressing Gzip files.
getHeader() - Method in class com.martinkl.warc.WARCRecord
Returns the parsed header structure of the WARC record.
getProgress() - Method in class com.martinkl.warc.WARCFileReader
Returns the proportion of the file that has been read, as a number between 0.0 and 1.0.
getRecord() - Method in class com.martinkl.warc.WARCWritable
Returns the record currently wrapped by this writable.
getRecordID() - Method in class com.martinkl.warc.WARCRecord.Header
An identifier assigned to the current record that is globally unique for its period of intended use.
getRecordReader(InputSplit, JobConf, Reporter) - Method in class com.martinkl.warc.mapred.WARCInputFormat
Opens a WARC file (possibly compressed) for reading, and returns a RecordReader for accessing it.
getRecordsRead() - Method in class com.martinkl.warc.WARCFileReader
Returns the number of records that have been read since the file was opened.
getRecordType() - Method in class com.martinkl.warc.WARCRecord.Header
Returns the type of WARC record (the value of the WARC-Type header field).
getRecordWriter(FileSystem, JobConf, String, Progressable) - Method in class com.martinkl.warc.mapred.WARCOutputFormat
Creates a new output file in WARC format, and returns a RecordWriter for writing to it.
getRecordWriter(TaskAttemptContext) - Method in class com.martinkl.warc.mapreduce.WARCOutputFormat
Creates a new output file in WARC format, and returns a RecordWriter for writing to it.
getTargetURI() - Method in class com.martinkl.warc.WARCRecord.Header
The original URI whose capture gave rise to the information content in this record.

I

isSplitable(FileSystem, Path) - Method in class com.martinkl.warc.mapred.WARCInputFormat
Always returns false, as WARC files cannot be split.
isSplitable(JobContext, Path) - Method in class com.martinkl.warc.mapreduce.WARCInputFormat
Always returns false, as WARC files cannot be split.

R

read() - Method in class com.martinkl.warc.WARCFileReader
Reads the next record from the file.
readFields(DataInput) - Method in class com.martinkl.warc.WARCWritable
Parses a WARCRecord out of a DataInput stream, and makes it the writable’s current record.

S

setRecord(WARCRecord) - Method in class com.martinkl.warc.WARCWritable
Updates the record held within this writable wrapper.

T

toString() - Method in class com.martinkl.warc.WARCRecord.Header
Formats this header in WARC/1.0 format, consisting of a version line followed by colon-delimited key-value pairs, and \r\n line endings.
toString() - Method in class com.martinkl.warc.WARCRecord
Returns a human-readable string representation of the record.

WARC_VERSION - Static variable in class com.martinkl.warc.WARCRecord
 
WARCFileReader - Class in com.martinkl.warc
Reads WARCRecords from a WARC file, using Hadoop’s filesystem APIs.

WARCRecord - Class in com.martinkl.warc
Immutable implementation of a record in a WARC file.

WARCWritable - Class in com.martinkl.warc
A mutable wrapper around a WARCRecord implementing the Hadoop Writable interface.

Creates an empty writable (with a null record).
WARCWritable(WARCRecord) - Constructor for class com.martinkl.warc.WARCWritable
